description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 2 iterations of function f(x) = 6x + 7.
comments: n, 6*n+7 and 36*n+49 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..100000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(6*n+7) and IsPrime(36*n+49)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
